Html:
Thanks for this amazing project!

I am currently calling x12parser via command line and when it hits a malformed file it fails, as would be expected.

However, it crashes and I get a 'OopFactory.X12.X12Parser has stopped working' error and am forced to select the 'Close the program' button.

I am currently trying to build out an automated solution and so this is requiring manual intervention.

Using Win7.

Don't suppose anyone has any thoughts?
Put the relevant code that's in the console app inside your code and put exception handling around it.

Thanks, that's a thought. 

I was able to work around it by forcing it to run as hidden window with a defined timeout period.


Thanks!
